mapper.insert: insert into tbl_users(user_name, login_password, pay_password, mobile, reserve_mobile, cardType, cardNo, bankNo, bankCardNo, secondBankCardNo, role_id, createTime,entryDate,disabled) values(#{userName}, #{login_password}, #{pay_password}, #{mobile}, #{reserve_mobile}, #{cardType}, #{cardNo}, #{bank.bankNo}, #{bankCardNo}, #{secondBankCardNo}, #{role_id}, #{createTime},#{createTime},'0')
mapper.update: update tbl_users set login_ticket=#{login_ticket}, access_token=#{access_token}, loginTime=#{loginTime} where mobile=#{mobile}
update tbl_users set login_password=#{login_password} where mobile=#{mobile}
update tbl_users set pay_password=#{pay_password} where mobile=#{mobile}
update tbl_users set bankno=#{bank.bankno}, bankcardno=#{bankcardno}, reserve_mobile=#{reserve_mobile} where mobile=#{mobile}
mapper.select: select user_id,user_name,mobile from tbl_users where disabled = '0' and login_ticket=#{login_ticket} and access_token=#{access_token}

select u.*,r.groupNumber,r.companyNumber companyId,r.dept_number,l.companyNumber,r.sysflag,d.name dept_name,c.name as com_name from tbl_users u left join tbl_roots r on u.user_id = r.userid left join tbl_roles l on u.role_id = l.role_id left join tbl_departments d on r.dept_number = d.dept_number left join tbl_company c on r.companyNumber = c.companyNumber where disabled = '0' and u.mobile=#{mobile}

select a.*,b.groupNumber,b.dept_number,c.companyNumber,b.sysflag,e.name as com_name from tbl_users a LEFT join tbl_roots b on a.user_id = b.userid left join tbl_roles c on a.role_id = c.role_id left join tbl_company e on b.companyNumber = e.companyNumber where disabled = '0' and a.user_name = #{userName}

select u.*,r.groupNumber,r.companyNumber companyId,r.dept_number,l.companyNumber,r.sysflag,d.name dept_name,c.name as com_name from tbl_users u left join tbl_roots r on u.user_id = r.userid left join tbl_roles l on u.role_id = l.role_id left join tbl_departments d on r.dept_number = d.dept_number left join tbl_company c on r.companyNumber = c.companyNumber where disabled = '0' and u.user_id = #{userId}

select a.id,a.name,a.url,a.code,a.father,a.icon,a.sorting from tbl_menu a where 1=1
and a.code in( select b.menuNumber from tbl_users a left join tbl_roleMenu b on a.role_id = b.role_id where a.disabled = '0' and a.user_name = #{userName})

select u.user_id,u.user_name,r.groupNumber,r.dept_number,r.companyNumber,r.sysflag from tbl_users u LEFT join tbl_roots r on u.user_id = r.userid left join tbl_roles l on u.role_id = l.role_id where u.disabled = '0' and r.companyNumber = #{comNum}
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{search},'%')
